short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that allows a user to change their cursor based on the website they are on

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Chrome extension that allows you to change your cursor based on the website you are on. Simply go to website that you want a custom cursor for, open the extension, customize your cursor, reload the tab, and you are good to go. 

If you like colorful cursors but need a classic black and white cursor for more professional settings, you can set that up. Set your default cursor to be colorful and add classic cursors for all your work sites. 

If you want a on theme cursor for all your frequent pages, go to each of your frequent sites, customize the cursor, and save them to your list. The next time you visit these sites your customized cursor will be displayed.
